Detailed Description

template<class InitPolicy, class UpdatePolicy>
class mdragon::ParticleManager< InitPolicy, UpdatePolicy >

Particle Manager represents concrete particle system template class.

It manages particle system. This template class have to be initialized by two policies in template parameters.

Parameters:
InitPolicy - initialization policy. This policy provide particles initialization.
UpdatePolicy - update policy. This policy provide particles update.

Member Function Documentation

void Update (  Fixed &  frame_time  ) 
 

Updates particle system.

Parameters:
frame_time - frame time particle system (time between two successive updates).
